name: Improved Overrun
descriptionText: You are skilled at running down your foes.
benefitText: You do not provoke an attack of opportunity when performing an overrun combat maneuver. In addition, you receive a +2 bonus on checks made to overrrun a foe. You also receive a +2 bonus to your Combat Maneuver Defense whenever an opponent tries to overrun you. Targets of your overrun attempt may not choose to avoid you.
normalText: You provoke an attack of opportunity when performing an overrun combat maneuver.
